typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Type_equipement as string,
		Num_syst_emetteur as string,
		CEB as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Num_service as string,
		Code_user as string,
		Compagnie_agent as string,
		Type_emplacement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Segment1
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Plateforme as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> segment0
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_oper_vente as string,
		Type_mvt as string,
		Categ_produit as string,
		Num_produit as string,
		Num_article as string,
		Num_unicite as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Num_contrat as string,
		Num_serie_prev as string,
		Date_Debut as timestamp,
		Date_Fin as timestamp,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Montant_part_tiers as double,
		{QuantitÃ©} as string,
		TauxTVA_an as string,
		Montant_global_vente as double,
		Nb_jetons as string,
		Nb_jetons_avant as string,
		Id_convention as string,
		Libelle_convention as string,
		Num_mobib as string,
		Code_article as string,
		Num_reseau_produit as string,
		Num_contrat_prev as string,
		Num_commande as string,
		Num_elt_commande as string,
		Type_elt_commande as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> segment2
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Comm_struct as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> segment3
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Hardware_type as string,
		Mode_TPV as string,
		Brand_id as string,
		Machine_number as string,
		Pdv_clct_nr as string,
		Pdv_gen_tx_nb as string,
		Transaction_identifier as string,
		Dateh_tpe as timestamp,
		Auth_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> segment4
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		TransactionReference as string,
		TransactionDateTime as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		StatementReference as string,
		PaymentMeanBrand as string,
		ValueDate as timestamp,
		Amount as double,
		AuthorizationId as string,
		MerchantId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> segment5
Segment1, segment2 join(Segment1@Id_transaction == segment2@Id_transaction,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2, segment3 join(Segment1@Id_transaction == segment3@Id_transaction,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
segment0, Join3 join(segment0@Code_segment == '000',
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'left')~> Join4
Join4 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as string,
		Type_equipement as integer,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Name as string,
		Guid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = {segment0@Code_segment},
		Poste_segment = {Segment1@Poste_segment},
		Id_transaction = {Segment1@Id_transaction},
		Num_serie = {Segment1@Num_serie},
		Id_entreprise = {segment2@Id_entreprise},
		Id_paiement,
		Code_moyen_paiement,
		Sens_paiement,
		Montant,
		Type_equipement,
		Date_ope,
		Name = Plateforme,
		Guid = {segment3@Id_entreprise}
	)) ~> sink1
